metadata.title: CVE-2014-2053 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
getID3() before 1.9.8, as used in ownCloud Server before 5.0.15 and 6.0.xbefore 6.0.2, allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files, cause adenial of service, or possibly have other impact via an XML External Entity(XXE) attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2053` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-getid3 - 1.9.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-getid3 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.8-1').
